article.title: Lockheed Martin Modification for Two GPS Space Vehicles
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corp., Newton, Pa., has been awarded a $245,778,905 modification (P00286) to cost-plus-incentive-fee contract FA8807-08-C-0010 to exercise the option for additional Global Positioning System III Space Vehicles 07 and 08. The Space and Missile Systems Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, Calif., is the contracting activity.
